lead_paragraph: The operation was intended to show that the United States opposes China’s efforts to restrict navigation in the strategic waterway, the Pentagon said.

byline.contributor: Yufan Huang contributed research from Beijing.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Destroyer Patrols Near Disputed Island
headline.main: U.S. Sails Warship Near Island in South China Sea, Challenging Chinese Claims

snippet: The operation was intended to show that the United States opposes China’s efforts to restrict navigation in the strategic waterway, the Pentagon said.
abstract: American warship ventures within 12 miles of artificial island built by China in South China Sea, demonstrating Unites States opposition to China's attempts to curtail travel in area; move comes ahead of United Nations arbitration ruling on whether Beijing may claim 12-mile territorial waters and 200-mile exclusive economic zones around South China Sea reefs and atolls.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
